summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated March 18, 2011. The email discusses the confidentiality of the communication and includes a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure. It highlights the attorney-client privilege and indicates that the information is intended solely for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is communicating with Jes Staley, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication.
It mentions that the information may be attorney-client privileged.
The email warns against unauthorized use, disclosure, or copying of the communication.
